data.title: New coffeehouse in downtown
data.text:
This place opened a couple of months ago, across the street from Starbucks. I figure Starbucks gets enough business, so I wanted to support another local small business. Good call!!! Fresh made muffins, pastries, wraps, etc. They also have homemade ice cream. Coffee is Kahwa; roasted locally in Tampa Bay, and it's not watered down.

I had a spinach and feta croissant that was very good. Mom had a nice fluffy croissant,  and dad had a fresh baked blueberry muffin. We all had the awesome coffee.

They have unique decor and seating for about 20. They have outlets by most seating to plug your devices in. Friendly staff and clean place.

Wraps and paninis sound good; I want to come back for lunch.

data.title: Very nice coffee house for breakfast or lunch
data.text: We stopped for a light lunch and really liked Grindhouse.  We split a Reuben Cuban sandwich, which was hot, delicious, and certainly big enough for two.  The staff is very friendly and the interior is very attractive and comfortable.  The original artwork / sculptures on the walls is gorgeous.  And, the prices are quite reasonable.  We'll definitely be back to try their many breakfast and lunch offerings, as well as the tempting-looking pastries.  Great addition to Cleveland Street!

data.title: NEW KID ON THE BLOCK ACROSS FROM STARBUCK'S
data.text:
OK! Recently opened coffee shop with pastries, sandwiches, soups, crepes, paninis, salads and homemade ice cream (try maple bacon)! Yummy!

Starring Starbuck's in the eye on the opposite corner!

Spacious bright interior, comfortable, moveable tables and chairs and along-the-wall cozy seating. And very clean restrooms.

BTW, really good hot and cold-press Kahwa coffee roasted in Tampa!

data.title: Great Food & Drink
data.text: The Grindhouse had a beautiful mural on the wall. We enjoyed the Strawberry Crepes and the Breakfast sandwich. The coffee had a great taste and the cappuccino was yummy. There is quite a few choices for desserts (especially the orange cake YUM). They also have homemade ice cream. They were having issues with the air in my opinion it was kind of hot.
